item.title: Scalable Documentation
item.author: andershurum@gmail.com (@peakbreaker)
item.description: Documentation In this entry, I am happy to be writing about something I have feelings for and about. Documentation is one of those core needs in the maslow pyramid of technology, yet far too often overlooked. It sounds easy, right? Just write some documents on what youre doing. Wrong, that attitude does not scale. Unmaintained documentation is worse than no documentation, and documentation accumulates the same technical dept as code,
